participant_1.background:
I always take a minute to think of my dog and how much I miss her.
I'm a professional trying to improve my accountability skills.
i love sweets.
My favorite holiday is Halloween because it is a time for fun and celebration.
I ate a lot of ice cream and wrote on my novel for my last birthday.

participant_2.background:
I love listening to music while I eat my tuna fish salad.
I would love to have a pet dog but I can't because of my job.
I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.
i am very familiar with hospitals and doctors.
I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books.

content.text: Happy new year!  I'm trying to be more accountable for myself this year.  I hope you're having a great day.
Happy new year to you too!  I hope you are having a great day as well.  I'm not a morning person so I'm still getting going.
I'm not a morning person either, but I have to be up early for work.  I'm a professional trying to improve my accountability skills.  What do you do for work?
I'm a nurse, so I work in a hospital.  I love my job, but it can be very busy.  I like to read books and drink hot chocolate when I get home from work.
I love reading books too!  I'm currently writing a novel.  I like to eat ice cream and write on my birthday.
That's awesome!  I would love to have a pet dog, but I can't because of my job.  I love listening to music while I eat my tuna fish salad.
I love dogs too!  I had a dog when I was younger, but she passed away a few years ago.  I love listening to music while I work too.
I'm sorry to hear about your dog.  I'm sure you gave her a great life.  I love my peace and quiet, but I also love spending time with my friends and family.
I know what you mean.  I love my alone time, but I also love being around people I care about.  I'm glad you're having a great day.
Thank you!  I'm glad you're having a great day too!
